scripts.say: Here you have it... the fruits of Akashi's hard work last night, nya!
pouts... Don't act like I didn't hear that. I helped with the technical stuff...
Whew! Brand spankin' new equipment! And what's more - it's super epic and exclusive to us!
Akashi, Yuubari, thank you very much. I'll be sure to treasure it!
Wooahh! Badass! Is this a cannon? Ah this thing shoots torpedoes too! I can't wait to unload all these explosives into someone's face!
Nya nya nya! Don't point those at other people!
Sorry, sorry! I'll be more careful!
Your ship rigging can be controlled freely with just your thoughts. As long as you don't space out, there shouldn't be any risk of misfiring... Woah, don't point those guns over here!
Mine seems to be different from Neptune's, with these main turrets. This one focuses on heavy firepower, doesn't it? The color also matches, not bad!
This rigging fits my image nicely... it has a nice white theme. Looks like it focuses on launching torpedoes...
Are these carrier aircraft? And this rigging lets you launch them? What's more, these planes are adorable. It's a perfect fit for me!
... Say, is it possible to make these planes into cute girls?
There would be an additional charge, nya.
Vert, you're the same as ever, even over here.
Then, then, can I turn my torpedoes into cute dolphins?
You can purchase these exclusive equipment skin boxes. The pricing goes something like this...
Save that discussion for later! Our first priority should be to take care of those clones.
In short, we can all fight together now! Onwards to the Mirror Sea!
We don't quite understand the circumstances, but they have not been able to draw out their full power. There still appear to be possibilities that remain hidden from our understanding.
Next, we must adapt to this dimension, and attain new power as well.
Hehehe... Things have gotten more interesting than I originally imagined.
I want to further witness the possibilities these girls contain... Let us observe them a bit longer...
